tasks.task_description: Build Docker image with latest enhanced UI changes
Push updated image to AWS ECR
Update ECS service with new task definition
Verify deployment and test enhanced UI functionality

description: Rebuild and redeploy NPHIES application with enhanced sleek UI to ensure complete integration
context: Successfully built Docker image nphies-ai:latest-sleek with all enhanced UI components including glass morphism effects, modern typography, and professional styling
Successfully pushed Docker image to ECR repository brainsait-nphies-ai with tag latest-sleek
Successfully registered new ECS task definition revision 9 with latest-sleek image containing all enhanced UI components
Successfully updated ECS service to use task definition revision 9 with latest-sleek image. Deployment is now in progress

Successfully completed rebuild and redeployment. Application is responding with HTTP 200 and enhanced UI components (gradient and glass effects) are confirmed to be working. ECS service is running task definition revision 9 with latest-sleek image.
